name: Mount Success
description:
A game about climbing your way towards success.

Climb the mountain named mount success. You don't know the road towards the summit. You only know you can walk and you have your oxygen cylinder. If it runs out, you are going back to your original place.(Hint:Summit is the highest point!).

Features:

  • 3D graphics 
  • Oxygen Cylinder
  • Dynamic weather
  • Immerse in the natural mountain climbing!
  • Climb your way to top!

Please note that this is the first version of the game. Bugs and improvements will be done in the next updates.

Enjoy!
